title: Profile Analysis
description: Analyse your win rate, wins, losses and match history with our desktop app. We're planning to bring online profile sharing, LP graph and more comprehensive profile page to you. Join our discord for suggestions!

title: Champ Select Analysis
description: Stragetize your picks based on your teammates' champion pool, check your teammates' current and last season's rank and recent match history. We're planning to add win/loss streak detection, one trick pony detection and many more in the future.
